original: Hönig, Eric Runo Valentin, lektor, civilingenjör, Norrköping, f. 1/7/94 i Norrköp. av fabr. Max H. o. Anna Sjögren. G. 19 m., Thyra Nilsson. Barn: Jarl f. 21, Eva 26. — Civ:ing:-ex. v. CTH 17. Ing. v. Fridafors 17, Halda 18-19, AGA 19-23, arb :chef o. tekn. led. f. Hönigs Angtvätt i Norrköp. 23-28, konsult, ing. i transp :teknik fr. 28, besiktn :man f. yrkesinsp., tiimliär. v. No-rrköp. tekn. gymn. 32-38, il’e’ktoi- i maskinilära m. ritn., mek. tek-nofl. samt liålilfasth :llära där sied. 39.
translated: Hönig, Eric Runo Valentin, teacher, civil engineer, Norrköping, born on July 1, 1894 in Norrköping to manufacturer Max H. and Anna Sjögren. Married since 1919 to Thyra Nilsson, with two children: Jarl, born in 1921 and Eva, born in 1926. He passed his engineering exam at the Chalmers University of Technology in 1917 and worked as an engineer at Fridafors in 1917, Halda in 1918-1919, AGA in 1919-1923, as a manager and technical leader for Hönigs laundry in Norrköping from 1923-1928. He worked as a consultant and engineer in transportation technology from 1928 and worked as an inspector for professional inspections, including being a temporary teacher at Norrköping technical gymnasium in 1932-1938, lecturer in mechanical engineering and drafting, mechanical technology and real estate law from 1939.
